item.title: Charge Back business process
item.description: A typical steps involved in the issuer response process for a card authorization, a simplified description is as following. Receive Authorization Request: The card issuer system receives the authorization request from the merchant or payment processor. Card Validation: The issuer system validates the card details provided in the request, including the card number, expiration date, and CVV/CVC. Account Verification: The issuer system verifies the cardholderâ€™s account details, such as account status, available funds, and credit limit (if applicable).
